column2: Formulate an ontology related to hour. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Hour a :TemporalUnit ;    rdfs:label "Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "An hour is a unit of time, equal to 60 minutes." ;    :isPartOf :Day ;    :consistsOf :Minute ;    :hasDurationInSeconds "3600"^^xsd:integer .:Minute a :TemporalUnit ;    rdfs:label "Minute" ;    rdfs:comment "A minute is a unit of time, equal to 60 seconds." ;    :isPartOf :Hour ;    :consistsOf :Second ;    :hasDurationInSeconds "60"^^xsd:integer .:Second a :TemporalUnit ;    rdfs:label "Second" ;    rdfs:comment "A second is the base unit of time in the International System of Units (SI)." ;    :isPartOf :Minute ;    :hasDurationInSeconds "1"^^xsd:integer .:Day a :TemporalUnit ;    rdfs:label "Day" ;    rdfs:comment "A day is a unit of time, typically measured as a period of 24 hours." ;    :consistsOf :Hour ;    :hasDurationInHours "24"^^xsd:integer .:DayTime a :TimePeriod ;    rdfs:label "Day Time" ;    rdfs:comment "The period of time during which there is daylight." .:NightTime a :TimePeriod ;    rdfs:label "Night Time" ;    rdfs:comment "The period of time during which it is dark." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: hour. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Hour a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents an hour of the day as a concept." .:Minute a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Minute" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents a minute of the hour." .:hasMinute a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range :Minute ;    rdfs:label "has minute" ;    rdfs:comment "Associates an hour with its minutes." .:HourValue a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range xsd:integer ;    rdfs:label "hour value" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents the integer value of an hour, typically ranging from 0 to 23." .:MinuteValue a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Minute ;    rdfs:range xsd:integer ;    rdfs:label "minute value" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents the integer value of a minute, typically ranging from 0 to 59." .:TimeOfDay a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Time Of Day" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents a specific time of day composed of hours and minutes." .:composedOf a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :TimeOfDay ;    rdfs:range :Hour ;    rdfs:label "composed of" ;    rdfs:comment "Associates a time of day with the hour it is composed of." .:Morning a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeOfDay ;    rdfs:label "Morning" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents the morning time of day." .:Afternoon a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeOfDay ;    rdfs:label "Afternoon" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents the afternoon time of day." .:Evening a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeOfDay ;    rdfs:label "Evening" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents the evening time of day." .:Night a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeOfDay ;    rdfs:label "Night" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents the night time of day." .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: hour.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Hour rdf:type owl:Class ;      rdfs:subClassOf :TimeUnit .:Time rdf:type owl:Class .:TimeUnit rdf:type owl:Class ;          rdfs:subClassOf :Time .:hasDuration rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;             rdfs:domain :TimeUnit ;             rdfs:range :xsd:duration .:HourEquivalent rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;                rdfs:domain :Hour ;                rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;                rdfs:comment "Represents the number of hours in a given duration." .:dateTimeHourly rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;                rdfs:domain :Hour ;                rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;                rdfs:comment "Represents an actual date-time instance corresponding to hours." .:exampleHourInstance rdf:type :Hour ;                     :HourEquivalent "1"^^xsd:decimal ;                     :dateTimeHourly "2023-10-01T13:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime .```

column2: Formulate an ontology related to hour. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/hour#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Hour rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "A unit of time equal to 60 minutes." .:Minute rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Minute" ;    rdfs:comment "A unit of time equal to 60 seconds, and a component of an hour." .:hasMinute rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range :Minute ;    rdfs:label "has minute" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates an hour to its component minutes." .:hasSecond rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Minute ;    rdfs:range xsd:integer ;    rdfs:label "has second" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a minute to its component seconds." .:Day rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Day" ;    rdfs:comment "A unit of time composed of 24 hours." .:hasHour rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Day ;    rdfs:range :Hour ;    rdfs:label "has hour" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a day to its component hours." .:TimePeriod rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Time Period" ;    rdfs:comment "A generic class for periods of time measured in hours." .:composedOf rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :TimePeriod ;    rdfs:range :Hour ;    rdfs:label "composed of" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a time period to the hours that compose it." .:morningHour rdf:type :Hour ;    rdfs:label "Morning Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "An hour that is considered part of the morning." .:afternoonHour rdf:type :Hour ;    rdfs:label "Afternoon Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "An hour that is considered part of the afternoon." .:eveningHour rdf:type :Hour ;    rdfs:label "Evening Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "An hour that is considered part of the evening." .:nightHour rdf:type :Hour ;    rdfs:label "Night Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "An hour that is considered part of the night." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: hour. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Hour rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing an hour of the day" .:Day rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Day" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a day, composed of 24 hours" .:TimeOfDay rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Time Of Day" ;    rdfs:comment "A class to represent different times of a day such as morning or afternoon" .:hasPart rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Day ;    rdfs:range :Hour ;    rdfs:label "has part" ;    rdfs:comment "A property to associate an hour with a day, indicating an hour is part of a day" .:precedes rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range :Hour ;    rdfs:label "precedes" ;    rdfs:comment "A property where one hour precedes another hour in sequence" .:hourValue rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range xsd:integer ;    rdfs:label "hour value" ;    rdfs:comment "The numeric value of the hour, usually ranging from 0 to 23" .:Morning rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeOfDay ;    rdfs:label "Morning" ;    rdfs:comment "A subclass of TimeOfDay representing the morning hours" .:Afternoon rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeOfDay ;    rdfs:label "Afternoon" ;    rdfs:comment "A subclass of TimeOfDay representing the afternoon hours" .:Evening rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeOfDay ;    rdfs:label "Evening" ;    rdfs:comment "A subclass of TimeOfDay representing the evening hours" .:Night rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeOfDay ;    rdfs:label "Night" ;    rdfs:comment "A subclass of TimeOfDay representing the night hours" .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: hour.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Hour rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "An Hour represents a unit of time equivalent to 1/24 of a day." .:hourValue rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "hour value" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents the numerical value of the hour." ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range xsd:integer .:hasNextHour rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has next hour" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates an hour to the subsequent hour in a day." ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range :Hour .:HourUnit rdf:type :Hour ;    :hourValue 1 ;    :hasNextHour [        a :Hour ;        :hourValue 2 ;    ] .```

column2: Formulate an ontology related to hour. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```ttl@prefix : <http://example.org/time#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .:Hour a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "A unit of time equal to 60 minutes." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeUnit .:Minute a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Minute" ;    rdfs:comment "A unit of time equal to 60 seconds." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeUnit .:Second a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Second" ;    rdfs:comment "The base unit of time in the International System of Units (SI)." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :TimeUnit .:TimeUnit a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Time Unit" ;    rdfs:comment "A unit used to measure time." .:partOf a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Minute ;    rdfs:range :Hour ;    rdfs:label "part of" ;    rdfs:subPropertyOf :partOfTimeUnit .:partOfTimeUnit a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "part of time unit" ;    rdfs:comment "A relationship indicating a smaller unit is part of a larger time unit." .:hasPart a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range :Minute ;    rdfs:label "has part" ;    rdfs:subPropertyOf :hasPartTimeUnit .:hasPartTimeUnit a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has part time unit" ;    rdfs:comment "A relationship indicating that a time unit has smaller constituent units." .:hasDuration a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range xsd:duration ;    rdfs:label "has duration" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies the duration of a time unit." .:oneHour a :Hour ;    :hasDuration "PT1H"^^xsd:duration .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: hour. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix ex: <http://example.org/ontology/> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .ex:Time rdf:type rdf:Class .ex:Hour rdf:type rdf:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Time .ex:hasHour rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Time ;    rdfs:range xsd:integer .ex:Minute rdf:type rdf:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Time .ex:hasMinute rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Time ;    rdfs:range xsd:integer .ex:Second rdf:type rdf:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Time .ex:hasSecond rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Time ;    rdfs:range xsd:integer .ex:AM rdf:type rdf:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Time .ex:PM rdf:type rdf:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Time .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: hour.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Hour a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing an hour as a unit of time." .:Minute a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Minute" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a minute as a unit of time." .:Second a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Second" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a second as a unit of time." .:hasMinutes a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range :Minute ;    rdfs:label "has minutes" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates an hour to the minutes it contains." .:hasSeconds a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Minute ;    rdfs:range :Second ;    rdfs:label "has seconds" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a minute to the seconds it contains." .:value a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Hour, :Minute, :Second ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;    rdfs:label "value" ;    rdfs:comment "The numerical value of the time unit." .:hasNextHour a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range :Hour ;    rdfs:label "has next hour" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates an hour to the next hour." .```
